document_data.name: Ghaliver Longstocking
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghaliver Longstocking''' was the [[halfling]] ruler of [[Westbridge]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ghaliver was a very able businessman: he possessed a farmer's market, a stockyard, a walled grain warehouse complex and an inn in Westbridge, and a few houses in [[Waterdeep]]. His goal was to find a means to protect himself in the years ahead.
document_data.Personality: Ghaliver was a charming individual, and was always working on new schemes. He was a good judge of others. His dream was to rule the [[North]] but by 1370 DR he had attracted only the attentions of the [[Zhentarim]] and similar groups.
